intro.apprentice_intro: You must be the new apprentice I was expecting!
intro.look_around:
*The scent of dried herbs and 
     something sweet lingers in the air.*
intro.ask_name: Tell me, what was your name again?
intro.hello_name: Oh of course, pleasure to meet you, {name}!
intro.scatter_brain: Forgive me, I have been a bit scatter-brained lately.
intro.need_help: Truth be told, I could really use an extra pair of hands around here.
intro.glad: I am glad to see you made it here safe!
intro.ask_background: So {name}, tell me a little about your past. I heard you were a:
background_options: A:  Wandering Orphan    C:  Noble Dropout
B:  Forest Child        D:  Quiet Scholar
intro.ask_traits: I am curious, though - what traits make you think you'll be a fit here?

backgrounds.Orphan: That must’ve been a tough journey, {name}. I bet you developed a sharp sense of intuition along the way.
backgrounds.Forest: How wonderful! Nature can teach us more than any book.
backgrounds.Noble: A noble background, and yet here you are to help me. I am honored!
backgrounds.Scholar: A scholar, hmm? I’m sure you’ll find the study of potions fascinating.

Orphan.confident: That fire in your step tells me you’re gonna go far!
Orphan.compassionate: All that hardship, yet your heart stayed soft. That’s real strength.
Orphan.bold: Life didn’t give you a path, so you made your own... with a bang, I imagine!
Orphan.analytical: I imagine surviving on your own teaches strategy like no book ever could.

Forest.confident: The wild raised you well, steady hands and a fearless heart!
Forest.compassionate: You carry the gentleness of moss and the patience of trees.
Forest.bold: Forest-born and rule-averse, you’re as wild as the wind through the leaves.
Forest.analytical: The patterns you can find in the woods are truly inspiring.

Noble.confident: Leaving comfort behind takes guts — seems you didn’t just inherit confidence, you earned it.
Noble.compassionate: Rare is the noble who trades gold for kindness. You might just be the real thing.
Noble.bold: Disrupting legacy with your own will? Now that’s alchemy.
Noble.analytical: You left the banquet to chase knowledge, clever move.

Scholar.confident: You may not speak much, but when you do, people listen.
Scholar.compassionate: I bet you study people as much as books, don’t you?
Scholar.bold: I bet you were the type to question the teacher more than the test.
Scholar.analytical: With a mind like that, potions are just puzzles waiting to be solved.

day_zero.intro: I think you'll fit in here just fine, {name}.
day_zero.lets_go: Well, It's time to get this show on the road!
day_zero.go_get: I need you to go out front and pick up the herb delivery for me.

potions: Oh dear. That smells like wet socks and regret. No worries, we’ll try again tomorrow.
